alerts.legal: By accessing, you automatically declare to have read and accepted our Terms of Service, Conditions of Use and Privacy Policy available in the Legal menu, as well as declaring to be over 18 years old.
alerts.passwordChangeInfo: After informing a new email we will send you a six digit code so that we can continue to change your current email.
alerts.passwordRecoverInfo: Enter your username, email and click continue, we will send you a code so you can create a new password.
alerts.passwordRecoverSuccess: Enter the code that was sent to your email and create a new password.
alerts.passwordNew: Enter you new password. It must be 4 to 12 characters long with 1 special character and 1 uppercase letter.
alerts.locationSuccess: We were able to obtain your location. We use your location so that you can find people near you but at no time do we share your location with other users. Click Continue.
alerts.locationFail1: It was not possible to obtain geolocation information because the page did not have permission to do so.
alerts.locationFail2: Achieving geolocation failed because at least one internal positioning source returned an internal error.
alerts.locationFail3: The maximum time allowed to obtain geolocation was reached before obtaining the information.
alerts.locationFail4: Your browser does not have the geolocation feature, use a more modern browser.
alerts.verificationCodeInstructions: We sent you an email containing a six-digit code, please enter that code to finish. If you have not received the email, look in the SPAM box or, if necessary, try using another email.
alerts.emptyGallery: You do not have any photos in your gallery. When you upload a photo, you can mark it as restricted, so only people you connect to will be able to see your photos. Photos that are not marked as restricted will be available for any people within the platform.
alerts.emptyProfileGallery: No photo available on this profile.
alerts.emptyProfileGalleryRestricted: No restricted photos available in this profile.
alerts.justAfterConnecting: Feature available to people who are already connected. Request a connection.
alerts.restrictedPicturesCountInfo: photos marked as restricted. Request a connection to access restricted photos.
alerts.chatStartInfo: You can already talk, how about starting by sending a message? Remember, the message is available for 48 hours, after which it will be automatically deleted.
alerts.emptyConversationsInfo: Here you can follow all the conversations in an organized way but you still don't have any active connection at the moment. Make connections.
alerts.removeItems: Are you sure you want to remove these items? After removing them, it will not be possible to get them back.
alerts.endSession: Are you sure you want to end your session?
alerts.disconnect: When you disconnect the person will not be notified and you can request a new connection whenever you want. Are you sure you want to continue?
alerts.block: By blocking a person you will no longer have contact and will no longer be visible to each other. Are you sure you want to continue?
alerts.unblock: Are you sure you want to unlock {{username}}? {{username}} will not be notified that you have unlocked it. After unlocking, if you wish, you must request a new connection with {{username}}.
alerts.cancelConnection: Are you sure you want to cancel the connection request with {{username}}? {{username}} will not be notified. You can still request a new connection with {{username}} whenever you want.
alerts.pictureLimit: You have reached your available photo limit.
alerts.isGeolocationAvailable: Your browser does not offer geolocation support. For this reason we are unable to display people who are close to you.
alerts.isGeolocationEnabled: Enable geolocation in your browser so that we can show people who are close to you with greater precision.
alerts.isGeolocationCoordsUnavailable: Enable geolocation in your browser so that we can show people who are close to you with greater precision.
alerts.secureInfo: All payments are processed by Stripe in a secure environment. After your payment has been completed the coins will be automatically counted and we will send a receipt to your email.
alerts.processingPayment: Thanks! Your payment is being processed, this usually takes a few minutes at most. As soon as it is completed, we will send you a receipt to your email and the coins will be counted automatically.

activities.title: Activities
activities.emptyMessage: Whenever someone views your profile or performs any other activity related to your profile, you will see it here. But for now we have nothing for you :(

picturesUpload.description: You can select up to {{qty}} photos simultaneously.

report.title: Report
report.description: When reporting a report, the profile reported will be verified and our team will be able to contact you directly via your email if necessary.

resources.title: Free resources
resources.subtitle: We are a social networking site and our mission is to connect people. That is why we believe that offering resources for free is essential to create a fairer environment for everyone and consistent with our mission. No monthly or hidden fees, see below all available resources:

item1.title: Find people nearby
item1.description: Find people who are close to you or who crossed paths with you and take advantage of the opportunities that come your way.

item2.title: Activities on your profile
item2.description: Find out everything that is happening, who accessed your profile, who requested a connection and more, all in real time.

item3.title: Visibility of your profile
item3.description: Whenever you wish, you can choose to remain invisible in searches and keep in touch only with people who have already connected.

item4.title: Unlimited conversations
item4.description: You can chat through our chat as soon as the other person accepts the connection request, without any limitation.

item5.title: Restricted Photos
item5.description: You can set restricted photos, so only people you accept to connect to will be able to see the photos you've marked as restricted.

item6.title: Reserved mode
item6.description: By activating the reserved mode, only you will be able to request a connection, this guarantees a higher level of respect and privacy.

gifts.title: Sending gifts
gifts.subtitle: You can send gifts to the people you are interested in even before you have made a connection. It's an interesting way to get attention and start a good relationship. Sending gifts is the only paid feature on the site. Find out more details about how gift sending works below:

item1.title: Who can buy coins?
item1.description: All users of our services will be able to buy virtual "Coins" with us, just access the Store menu and buy the package of "Coins" you want.

item2.title: Buy coins
item2.description: The price of the Coins will be displayed at the time of purchase. Payment can be made using your credit card and all transactions are made in a secure environment provided by Stripe.

item3.title: How you can use coins
item3.description: Coins can be used to purchase Virtual Gifts "Gifts" that can be sent to other users within the platform.
